allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: Remove hardcoded credentials and implement environment variables

Security improvements:
- Remove exposed Gmail credentials from contactRoute.js
- Implement environment variables for email configuration
- Update .gitignore to protect .env files
- Remove .env from git tracking
- Add .env.example as configuration template
- Create SECURITY-SETUP.md with setup instructions

Breaking: Requires manual .env configuration before running server

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
